tgt_original: varṣāṇāṃ sahasraṃ kālasūtranarakasyāyuḥ ||  9 | punaḥ khalu dva mānuṣavarṣaśate yāmadevānāmahorātraṃ |
evaṃ triṃśad dinānyeko māsaḥ |  dvādaśamāsā ekaṃ varṣaṃ |
evaṃ triṃśad dinānyeko māsaḥ |  dvādaśamāsā ekaṃ varṣaṃ |
paṃcavarṣaśatāni saṃjīvanarakasyāyuḥ ||  8 | punaḥ khalu mānupavarpaśataṃ trayastriṃśaddevānāmahorātraṃ |
evaṃ triṃśaddinānyeko māso dvādaśamāsā ekaṃ varṣaṃ |  divyaṃ varṣasahasraṃ trayastriṃśaddevānāmāyuḥ |  tadetadgaṇanayā mānuṣāṇāṃ tisro varṣakoṭayaḥ ṣaṣṭivarṣaśatasahasrāṇi ||
dve varṣasahasre saṃghātanarakasyāyuḥ ||  10 | punaḥ khalu catvāri mānuṣavarṣaśatāni tuṣitadevānāmahorātraṃ |
